item.description:
Right on the heels of the IFFB- the Brattle presents a series of classic United Artist films- a bit of comfort food, perhaps. This double-feature presents the debut of Sean Connery as James Bond, and Peter Sellars as Dr. No- no that's a mistake, Peter Sellars is of course the Pink Panther, no that's not right either. Pardon. Peter Sellars is the indisputable Inspector Jacques Clouseau. Then again, Dr No might have the funnier lines:

Dr. No: That's a Dom Perignon '55, it would be a pity to break it
James Bond: I prefer the '53 myself...

Dr. No: I'm a member of SPECTRE
James Bond: SPECTRE?
Dr. No: SPECTRE. Special Executive for Counter Intelligence, Terrorism, Revenge, Extortion. The four great cornerstones of power headed by the greatest brains in the world.
James Bond: Correction. Criminal brains!
Dr. No: The successful criminal brain is always superior. It has to be!

Pink Panther 1964 113 minutes Screens at 5:15
http://www.allmovie.c...

Dr. No 1962 110 minutes Screens at 7:30
http://www.allmovie.c...


Thought this might make for a fun evening-
Tom
item.how_to_find_us: Tom will be at the front row as the credits roll and then its off to a local restaurant to discuss.
item.name: The Pink Panther and Dr. No at the Brattle
